SqlQuery.Data: SELECT IFNULL(event.cid, 0) as cid, IFNULL(event.sid, 0) as sid, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ver, 0) as ip_ver, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_hlen, 0) as ip_hlen, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_tos, 0) as ip_tos, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_len, 0) as ip_len, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_id, 0) as ip_id, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_flags, 0) as ip_flags, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_off, 0) as ip_off, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ttl, 0) as ip_ttl, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_csum, 0) as ip_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, event.timestamp as timestamp, signature.sig_id as sig_id, signature.sig_sid as sig_sid, signature.sig_name as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, IFNULL(signature.sig_rev, 0) as sig_rev, IFNULL(signature.sig_gid, 0) as sig_gid, IFNULL(sig_class.sig_class_name,'') as sig_class_name, IFNULL(sensor.hostname,'') as sensor_name, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_seq, 0) as tcp_seq, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_ack, 0) as tcp_ack, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_off, 0) as tcp_off, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_res, 0) as tcp_res, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_win, 0) as tcp_win, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_csum, 0) as tcp_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_urp, 0) as tcp_urp, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_len, 0) as udp_len, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_csum, 0) as udp_csum, data.data_payload as data_payload, IFNULL(acknowledgment.id, 0) as acknowledgment_id, IFNULL(acknowledgment.initials, '') as initials, IFNULL(acknowledgment_class.desc, '') as acknowledgment_class FROM event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment on (acknowledgment.sid = event.sid AND acknowledgment.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment_class on (acknowledgment_class.id = acknowledgment.class ) LEFT JOIN sig_class on (signature.sig_class_id = sig_class.sig_class_id) LEFT JOIN sensor ON (sensor.sid = event.sid ) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND signature.sig_id = @1 LIMIT @2, @3
